fr:title.text: Categorical phase semantics for linear logic

fr:frontmatter.fr:title: Categorical phase semantics for linear logic

fr:mainmatter.fr:p: We introduce the generalized phase semantics of linear logic, a categorical framework for constructing provability-sound models of linear logic from the subobject posets of monoids. We prove soundness and completeness results in categories with well-behaved factorization systems, and prove soundness for fragments of the logic in categories with less structure present.
